bibl.title: Satyr Drama. Tragedy at Pal
bibl.note: Paper presented at a conference sponsored by the Department of Classics, Xavier University, Cincinnati, 21-22 February 2003. - See in part. pp. 9-11: 10. Diktyoulkoi ('Net-haulers'). Text and translation of the longest continuous passage preserved in the papyrus fragments.
bibl.seg: George W.M. HARRISON (Ed.), Satyr Drama. Tragedy at Pal (Swansea, 2005) pp. 1-19.
